## isSupported() function

Checks if all required APIs exist in the browser.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function isWindowSupported(): Promise<boolean>;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;boolean&gt;

a Promise that resolves to a boolean.
